# Ancestral Regression (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] ([[Polymorph Spells|polymorph]])

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[3rd Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 3]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 2]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 3]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Willing drow touched

**Duration:** 24 hours (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 107

The target drow transforms into a surface elf. The drow loses her [[S3.1D-F - Universal Monster Rules D-F (Bestiary 6 Apx)|darkvision]] and [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|light-blindness]] racial traits and gains the [[S3.1G-M - Universal Monster Rules G-M (Bestiary 6 Apx)|low-light vision]] racial trait in their place. The alignment and personality of the drow are not affected by the transformation, but the spell conceals her alignment as an *[[Undetectable Alignment (Spell)|undetectable alignment]]* spell. The spell grants the target a +10 bonus on [[Disguise (Skill)|Disguise]] checks to pass as an elf, though she appears to be an elven analog of herself
